info.description: This is a sample server for AutoBan.
info.title: AutoBan API

get.description: Get a list of all users with pagination
Get detailed information about a specific user

delete.description: Delete a user from the system

post.description: Change the password of a user
Change the role of a user
Change the status of a user
Login a user with phone number and password
Logout a user by invalidating the refresh token
Logs out the user from all devices by invalidating all refresh tokens
Get new access and refresh tokens using a valid refresh token
Register a new user with phone number and password

get.description: Returns all active sessions for the authenticated user
Get a list of all user vehicle
Get details of a specific user vehicle

put.description: Update the details of a specific user vehicle

get.description: Get a list of all oil changes for a user vehicle
Get the last oil change for a user vehicle
Get information about a specific oil change
Get all oil filter change records for a specific user vehicle
get.summary: List oil filter changes for a user vehicle

get.description: Get the most recent oil filter change record for a specific user vehicle
get.summary: Get last oil filter change for a user vehicle

get.description: Get a specific oil filter change record by its ID
get.summary: Get oil filter change by ID

get.description: Get all service visit records for a specific user vehicle
get.summary: List service visits for a user vehicle

post.description: Create a new service visit record for a user vehicle with optional services

get.description: Get the most recent service visit record for a specific user vehicle
get.summary: Get last service visit for a user vehicle

get.description: Get a specific service visit record by its ID

put.description: Update an existing service visit record

get.description: Get the profile information of the authenticated user

put.description: Update the profile information of the authenticated user
Update the password of the authenticated user

get.description: Get a list of all available vehicle brands
Get details of a specific vehicle brand
Get a list of vehicle models for a specific vehicle brand
Get a list of all available vehicle generations
Get details of a specific vehicle generation
Get a list of all available vehicle models
Get details of a specific vehicle model
Get a list of vehicle generations for a specific vehicle model
Get a list of all available vehicle types
Get details of a specific vehicle type
Get a list of vehicle brands for a specific vehicle type

new_password.description: New password for the user (minimum 8 characters)

role.description: New role for the user (User, Admin, SuperAdmin)

status.description: New status for the user (Active, Deactivated, Deleted)

service_center.description: Service center where service was performed

current_mileage.description: Current mileage of the user vehicle

license_plate.description: License plate of the user vehicle

production_year.description: Production year of the user vehicle

purchase_date.description: Purchase date of the user vehicle

assembly_type.description: Assembly type of the vehicle generation

body_style.description: Body style of the vehicle generation

description.example: A brief description of the generation

end_year.description: End year of the vehicle generation

engine_size.description: Engine size of the vehicle generation

engine_type.description: Engine type of the vehicle generation

special_features.description: Special features of the vehicle generation

start_year.description: Start year of the vehicle generation

end_year.description: End year of the vehicle model

start_year.description: Start year of the vehicle model

dto.GetSessionsResponse.description: Response containing list of user sessions

password.description: Password must be at least 8 characters long and include uppercase, lowercase, and numbers

filter_part_number.description: Part number of the oil filter

id.description: ID of the oil filter change

service_center.description: Service center where filter was changed

password.description: Password must be at least 8 characters long and include uppercase, lowercase, and numbers

filter_part_number.description: Part number of the oil filter
Part number of the oil filter

service_center.description: Service center where service was performed

dto.TokenResponse.description: User login response containing access and refresh tokens
